verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a path which no fowl knoweth,
The vulture's eye hath never seen.
Where no thorn tree nor thistle groweth,
No hedge to hinder completely clean.
Chorus:
High in the mountain, above earth's stormy sphere,
Above the heaven's coral plain.
It's paved with gold and precious stones so dear.
It leads to love, the highest gain.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To walk this path there is a cross to bear.
But at the end there is a crown to wear.
A crown of life and love unheard before,
When we have passed o'er on the other shore.
